description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION A HIP TO GABLE AND REAR ROOF EXTENSION WITH INSTALLATION OF 3 ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT SLOPE. ERECTION OF SINGLE STOREY REAR OUTBUILDING.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a hip to gable and rear roof dormer extension would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the installation of three roof lights in the roof slope would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations comprising the erection of a single storey incidental garden outbuilding would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in Class E. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
